WorkflowInfo.Name: Servers shutdown procedure
WorkflowInfo.Description: Shutdown servers according to a pre defined list
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:MemorySet;Assembly=MemorySet, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ReadXLS;Assembly=ReadXLS, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:Wait;Assembly=Wait, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:Ping;Assembly=Ping, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:ServerShutdown;Assembly=ServerShutdown, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns10="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue=" " DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="False" VariableName="ShutdownServersReport" x:Name="memorySet1" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /> <ns1:ReadXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="readXLS1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Read Excel" Path="c:\ServersList.xls" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Read excel file" HostId="1" TypeName="ReadXLS" UserName="" /> <ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns5:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns6:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns7:Ping IsValid="True" x:Name="ping1" TimeInSeconds="60" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="%ServerName%" DisplayName="Ping" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Run a Ping command line" HostId="-2" TypeName="Ping" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="CHECK_SERVER_STATUS"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="SERVER_UP"> <ns8:ReturnValue Value="Success" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Success)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns9:ServerShutdown IsValid="True" x:Name="serverShutdown1" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" ActionTypeList="Forced,Normal" ActionType="Forced" DisplayName="Server Shutdown" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Shutdown the selected server" HostId="-2" TypeName="ServerShutdown" UserName="" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="SERVER_DOWN"> <ns8:ReturnValue Value="Failure" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Failure)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns10:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <ns3:Wait IsValid="True" x:Name="wait1" TimeInterval="" isDefault="0" DisplayName="Wait" TimeInSeconds="600" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Pause workflow" TypeName="Wait" TimeValue="" Timeout="00:10:00" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity2" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"> <ns5:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns6:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName2" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns7:Ping IsValid="True" x:Name="ping2" TimeInSeconds="60" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="%ServerName2%" DisplayName="Ping" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Run a Ping command line" HostId="-2" TypeName="Ping" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns8:ReturnValue Value="Success" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue3" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Success)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue="%ServerName2%" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="True" VariableName="ShutdownServersReport" x:Name="memorySet2" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns8:ReturnValue Value="Failure" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue4" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Failure)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns10:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <ns4:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Server Shutdown Report" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 11.00.9600.16476"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">
<P><STRONG>The folowwing servers were not shut 
down:<BR>--------------------------------------------------------------<BR></STRONG>%ShutdownServersReport%</P></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process retrieves a list of servers from an Excel file or a memory table and checks if the server is up or down. In case the server is up a shutdown process is performed, and at the end of the process a report is sent to Admin. This process can be used for 2 main purposes: The first is to use this procedure to shut down your servers quickly in case of emergency (when moving to DRP site or when the Data Center is not in ideal environmental state). The second is to shut down all PCs in the company in a specific time every evening or when the weekend starts, to save in resources and become a more green company.
